<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/chat-gateway/v1/jwk/{jwkId}/public"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Returns the public JWK that can be used to validate the message signature.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

  parameters={[{"name":"jwkId","in":"path","description":"JWK UUID","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string","format":"string"},"example":"EXaiWfZe20eSjklZ70074w"},{"name":"X-8x8-Tenant","in":"header","required":false,"description":"Tenant ID, it is going to be mandatory if customer has more than one CC tenant in his organisation.","schema":{"type":"string","format":"string"},"example":"TheTenant"}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
